name: Water Genasi
description: Water genasi are descended from marids, the genies of the Elemental Plane of Water. They are often patient and independent, with a connection to the sea.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Acid Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to acid damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: You can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Swim
traits.description: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

traits.name: Call to the Wave
traits.description: You know the Shape Water cantrip. At 3rd level, you can cast Create or Destroy Water once as a 2nd-level spell. You regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
